https://tmrev.io/movie/961952-Bendum: In The Heart of Mindanao 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null This documentary is about the homeland and daily life of an indigenous tribal community in the tropical uplands of central Mindanao in the Philippines. In this small village called Bendum, the local community has successfully struggled after decades of commercialized logging and deforestation, to gain control over their ancestral lands Bendum: In The Heart of Mindanao
